artist: Engraver: John Charles Bromley; Artist: After Canaletto (Giovanni Antonio Canal)
description: view of Rialto bridge in Venice with gondolas in foreground, barge with barrels at right; pedestrians on walk at right and left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [Painted by Canaletti   Engraved by John Bromley/ THE RIALTO/ From the Picture in the possession of James Stuart Wortly, Esq\'r. M.P./ GEMS OF ART PLATE 25]; in pencil on sheet: {2-220]
title: The Rialto
